TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITrackingHandler

summary.span: 指示实现对象必须得到由远程结构发出的有关对象与代理的封送处理、取消封送处理和断开的通知。

span.span: Indicates that the implementing object must be notified of marshaling, unmarshaling, and disconnection of objects and proxies by the remoting infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注册的每个对象时的对象或代理在当前由远程处理调用封送、 取消封送或断开连接。Every object that is registered with is called by remoting when an object or proxy in the current is marshaled, unmarshaled, or disconnected. 请注意，仅对象可以断开连接。Note that only objects can be disconnected. 将引发异常时断开连接代理服务器上调用。An exception is thrown when disconnect is called on a proxy. > [!NOTE] > 此接口使链接要求。This interface makes a link demand. 如果直接调用方发出通过接口的引用调用，而不具有基础结构的权限，将引发安全异常。A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission. 请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法的方法接口从远程处理基础结构接收通知。The following code example shows how to implement the methods of the interface to receive notifications from the remoting infrastructure. 下面的代码示例演示如何实现此接口。The following code example shows how to implement this interface. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/trackinghandler.cs#30)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在服务器上实现此接口。The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a server. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/server.cs#20)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在前面的代码示例中的服务器的客户端上实现此接口。The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a client for the server in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/client.cs#0)] 下面的代码示例显示由服务器和客户端的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the server and the client. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/remoteservice.cs#10)]

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisconnectedObject(object obj) cil managed

summary.span: 通知当前实例某个对象已与其代理断开连接。

span.span: Notifies the current instance that an object has been disconnected from its proxy.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现此方法。The following code example shows how to implement this method. 此代码示例是一个更大的示例为提供的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the interface. span.span: The object that has been marshaled.

param.name: or
param.span: ，它由封送处理产生，并表示指定的对象。

span.span: The that results from marshaling and represents the specified object.
